name: CORE_OVERLOAD
description:
Enter the grid, a digital world overrun by hostile programs, and overload all of the enemy's cores to win control over the system!

CORE_OVERLOAD is a simple singleplayer RTS where you command units to gather resources, construct buildings, train combatants, and send armies to do battle in a digital world.

HOW TO PLAY

Build and command units, gather purple bits and yellow spikes, defend your base from enemy attacks and send out forces to clear the enemy out of the grid. The game ends when one team loses all of its cores. Destroy all of the enemy's cores while protecting your own to achieve victory!

CONTROLS

ESC / Tab - Settings menu

Left Click - Select units & buildings, select menu option, place selected building

Left Click Drag - Draws a box to select multiple units at once

Right Click - Issue order depending on what is selected and what is clicked on:

  • the ground to order selected units to move to that location
  • the ground with a building selected to set its spawn waypoint
    • units that building produces will automatically move to that building's spawn waypoint
  • an enemy to order selected units move attack it
  • an unfinished building to order selected workers to construct it
  • resources to order selected workers to gather them
  • our core to order selected workers to deposit resources
